explanations.only: Solutions for vertical Entry: [{{ explanation.notesBefore }}] Solutions for horizontal Entry: [{{ explanation.possibleSolutions }}]. The only possible solution is: {{ explanation.cell.value }}
explanations.intersection: The union of horizontal and vertical sets is: [{{ explanation.possibleSolutions }}]. Possible solutions for this cell are: [{{ explanation.notesBefore }}]. The solution is: {{ explanation.cell.value }}
explanations.random: The definite solution for this cell couldn't be determined. Possible solutions would be [{{ explanation.possibleSolutions }}]. Picked random solution: {{ explanation.cell.value }}.
explanations.solved: Possible solutions for this cell could have been [{{ explanation.notesBefore }}]. Because the last solution was {{ explanation.cellSolution }}, this cell can't be the same value anymore. Therefore the solution is: {{ explanation.cell.value }}.
